EnergyReduction.Name: energy reduction
EnergyReduction.Description: Reduces the energy consumed per swing

InstantChop.Name: instant-chop chance
InstantChop.Description: Chance to fell an entire tree and stump in one hit

ExtraWood.Name: extra wood collected
ExtraWood.Description: Increases wood from chopped trees by the specified amount, rounded up

Regrowth.Name: regrowth chance
Regrowth.Description: Fully-chopped trees have a chance to automatically re-plant and re-fertilize

EnergyReduction.Name: energy reduction
EnergyReduction.Description: Reduces the energy consumed per swing

RandomForage.Name: forage item chance
RandomForage.Description: Chance per tilled tile to dig up a random forage item from any season

ExtraClay.Name: extra clay
ExtraClay.Description: Increases quantity of clay drops by the specified amount, rounded up

RandomClay.Name: higher clay chance
RandomClay.Description: Clay appears more frequently; stacks with profession and enchantment bonuses

UniqueArtifacts.Name: artifact swap chance
UniqueArtifacts.Description: Chance to swap an already-donated artifact with a new artifact when digging artifact spots

UpgradedOre.Name: ore upgrade chance
UpgradedOre.Description: Chance to upgrade the quality of any ore received by one tier (copper -> iron -> gold -> iridium -> radioactive)

MoreItems.Name: extra item chance
MoreItems.Description: Chance to receive special items increased; multiplicative with base chance

EnergyReduction.Name: energy reduction
EnergyReduction.Description: Reduces the energy consumed per swing

InstantBreak.Name: instant-break chance
InstantBreak.Description: Chance to break up any node in one hit, regardless of its type

Explode.Name: explosion chance
Explode.Description: Chance for each swing to cause a small explosion (will not damage the player)

DoubleOre.Name: double ore chance
DoubleOre.Description: Chance to receive double the usual amount of ore when cracking a node; stacks with profession bonuses

ExtraGems.Name: extra gem chance
ExtraGems.Description: Chance to receive one extra gem from gem nodes or random drops; stacks with profession bonuses

ExtraDamage.Name: damage increase
ExtraDamage.Description: Additional damage done to monsters with each hit

BiggerExplosions.Name: bigger explosions
BiggerExplosions.Description: Explosive ammo will create bigger explosions, rounded up to the nearest tile

EnergyReduction.Name: energy reduction
EnergyReduction.Description: Reduces the energy consumed per use

FasterGrowth.Name: crop growth chance
FasterGrowth.Description: Chance for a newly-watered crop or section of crops to immediately gain a full day of growth

WaterReduction.Name: water conservation
WaterReduction.Description: Less water is lost from the can on each use
